name: Yellow Wool Brooch
description:
A sweet yellow wool brooch.    

All are hand made using wool coating, felt shapes with hand stitched embellishment and a lovely big button.

Each brooch is individually made, there are no two exactly the same, the shade of buttons may vary.  

Prefect stocking fillers.

name: Lavender Bag
description:
Lovely hand made lavender bag.  

Made from 100% linen, this little bag is machine stitched with cut work to expose the lower layer of fabric creating pretty petals.  A mini button is hand stitched on and the flower pot is made using dress making patterned paper.      

Pop this sweet wee lavender bag under your pillow for a relaxing nights sleep or in hang it in your wardrobe.  

Each bag is individually hand made and the fabric colours may vary.

name: "Running Hedgehog" Framed Piece
description:
Framed patchwork picture, 'Running Hedgehog". 

This little piece of work combines patchwork vintage linen tablecloths, silk & cotton fabrics, with hand stitching to create a row of flowers watched on by the sweet hedgehog.  

Each flower is made up using layered fabric and dress making patterned paper stitched together with a button. 

A lovely picture to brighten up any wall in your home.

name: Fabric Brooch
description:
A little fabric brooch to adorne your coat, bag or anything really, have one on there own or a collection.  

They are made from Japanese printed fabrics and have fun images.  Each one has a die cut felt flower, which is hand stitched with a colourful button.  

Each brooch is packaged in a glassine envelope with ribbon and tag.  

Perfect for stocking fillers.

Each one is individually hand made and fabric designs will vary.  
Sold individually.
